Text: Bone News Cc Dear Friends Friday was my last official day at Wyatt Tarrant Combs You will find my new temporary contact information at the conclusion of this email I look forward to hearing from you While no longer at Wyatt I will be working closely with the Wyatt lawyers on client matters while I consider several options which are available to me as I plan for the future I look forward to an exciting Please note that Vicki Scruggs continues at Wyatt You will also note that we are all here in the same building and working to make this transition as efficient as possible Most importantly we are committed to the seamless delivery of legal services to our wonderful clients and we appreciate their patience during the transition Best wishes for a great Thanksgiving Charles W Bone West End Avenue th Floor Nashville TN Phone Fax Cell Email Address Vicki L Scruggs Wyatt Tarrant Combs West End Avenue Suite Nashville TN Phone Fax Cell Email Address
